long_description: A basic bike computer with a gigantic display, the CatEye Padrone Bike Computer offers squint-free visibility and a fast, simple set-up. As compared with the CatEye Urban Wireless, a very popular model that features standard bike computer dimensions, the Padrone is 22% thinner and 85% larger for easy viewing. Functions include current, average and maximum speed, trip distance, odometer, elapsed time, clock and automatic start/stop. 2.65 x 1.7 in. display can be easily seen during any riding conditions. ClickTec button interface offers easy navigation between the screens. Flextight universal mounting bracket fits virtually all handlebars. CatEye Padrone Bike Computer includes a CR2032 battery.
short_description: A basic bike computer with a gigantic display, the CatEye Padrone Bike Computer offers squint-free visibility and a fast, simple set-up.
